CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT is the only person in the room in camera view
MOT motions to the toy football on the floor with her hand
the camera moves to reveal that MOT is talking to CHI whom she is holding in her arms
MOT puts her pocketbook down on the chair near the door
MOT turns to face the camera
MOT puts CHI's bottle down on the desk
<aft> MOT kneels down on the floor with CHI
CHI starts pushing away from MOT
MOT puts CHI down on the floor
CHI walks over to the chair at the table
CHI sits down in the chair
<aft> CHI turns and looks at MOT and sticks her foot out
<bef> MOT removes one of CHI's boots
<aft> MOT sits on the floor where she was before
CHI turns and looks at the table
<bef> CHI turns and looks at MOT then points to the desk . <1u-1u .> CHI looks at the desk
<$=2> MOT comes over to the table
MOT picks up the toy football and puts it on the table in front of CHI
MOT puts the book on the table and starts to open the cover
CHI holds the football with both hands
MOT points to picture of cat on the cover of the book
< .1-1 .> CHI looks at the book while holding the football
it is hard to tell where MOT is looking because her face is not in camera view
CHI is still looking at the book
MOT points to picture of ball on the cover
<bef> MOT opens the cover of the book and turns one page
MOT points to the page . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
MOT points to picture of gate on opposite page
MOT points to picture of egg . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
CHI shrugs her shoulders and leans back
MOT points to the page . <aft> MOT pulls her shirt down
MOT crouches down and looks at CHI
CHI smiles and points to the page with the football that is in her hand
<$=1> MOT picks up the jack+in+the+box off of the floor
MOT points to the page . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
CHI glances at the book and the looks up at MOT
CHI puts the football on the table
<aft> MOT starts turning the handle again
<bef> CHI watches MOT . CHI reaches for the handle which MOT is still turning
CHI balances the jack+in+the+box between her lap and the arm of the chair
CHI puts one hand on the handle and uses the other to hold down the box
MOT removes CHI's hand from the top of the box
<$=1> MOT moves CHI's other hand away
CHI pulls her hands back and watches MOT
CHI smiles and looks at the clown then looks at MOT
MOT leans forward to look into CHI's face
< .1-1 .> CHI examines the clown . <aft> CHI grabs the clown
CHI is still holding onto and looking at the clown
MOT pushes her glasses to her face
<bef> CHI pushes the clown in the box and closes the cover . CHI hands the jack+in+the+box to MOT
CHI turns around to face the table as she settles herself in the chair
MOT picks the toy duck up from the floor and holds it in front of CHI
CHI is still looking at the duck
<aft> CHI looks up towards MOT slightly
<bef> CHI squeezes the duck . CHI hands duck to MOT
MOT takes the toy duck and accidentally drops it on the floor
CHI reaches down to get the duck
<bef> MOT gets the duck and holds it up in front of CHI . MOT squeezes the duck briefly . <aft> MOT hands the duck to CHI
MOT puts the book on the floor
CHI drops the duck on the floor again
CHI looks at the duck and tries to reach it
MOT picks up the toy car and puts it on the table
< .1-1> CHI looks at the table . <2-4> CHI looks down at the floor as she reaches for the duck . <aft> CHI looks at the car on the table
MOT picks up the duck and hands it to CHI
CHI takes the toy duck from MOT . <aft> CHI holds the toy duck over the car and then pulls it back
CHI still looks at the car on the table
MOT takes the toy duck from CHI and puts it on the car
MOT pushes the car towards CHI
the car knocks the football on to the floor
CHI lays the duck back on the car
CHI rolls the car back and forth on the table
<bef> MOT sits on the floor and looks at the chair across the room
CHI turns around and looks at the other chair
<1-4> MOT looks at and points to the chair . <5-8 .> MOT looks at CHI
< .1-1 .> CHI looks up towards the desk
MOT points to the chair CHI is in
MOT points to the other chair
CHI looks at the other chair
MOT points at the other chair
MOT moves over on the floor
CHI picks up her chair and puts it next to the other chair
CHI starts to pick up the other chair
CHI picks up the other chair and moves it closer to her chair
CHI looks at the chair and scratches her head
<aft> CHI looks at the chair and scratches her head then looks at the other chair
CHI turns her chair so that it is directly in front of the other chair
CHI starts to climb up onto the chair that is in the back
MOT smiles and looks at CHI
CHI climbs all the way on the chair
CHI looks at MOT then raises her fists in the air and moves them as if she is holding a steering wheel
CHI makes car noises for about 5 seconds
<bef> CHI moves her hands in the air
CHI stops moving her hands and gets down from the chair
CHI pulls at the straps on the chair . <aft> CHI walks around to the front of the chair
<bef> CHI's drops the strap . CHI sits in the front chair
CHI looks down as she reaches for the straps
CHI looks down at the strap
<aft> CHI looks up at the door
INV enters the room , INV leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place and re-enters at 13:27:21
CHI is so upset by the INV that she asks for her bottle and has it throughout most of the PCI boxes
INV explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT . CHI is crying and refuses to leave MOT so she sits on her lap .
MOT picks up a string of beads and places them on the floor near INV
INV gets the object out of the desk drawer
INV places the object on the table
CHI looks up at the table
INV sets the object in motion
MOT looks at the object and smiles
CHI moves closer to MOT burrowing in her bosom
<bef> MOT looks down at CHI . MOT looks up and smiles . <aft> MOT looks down at CHI
CHI tries to get closer to MOT
MOT turns CHI to face INV
<aft> MOT looks at INV and smiles
<1> MOT gestures to the object briefly
INV places the object back in the drawer
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . INV picks up the toys from Small Scale Activity . CHI is still sitting on MOT's lap crying until INV leaves
MOT gets up on her knees and puts CHI on the floor
CHI stands at the table and watches MOT
MOT goes to the desk and gets the box with the ball in it
MOT holds the Ball box out to CHI
<bef> CHI looks in the box . <aft> CHI holds the ball up to her mouth
<bef> CHI reaches in the box and pulls out the ball
MOT puts the box back on the desk
CHI still has the ball up to her lips
<aft> MOT puts her hands out to get the ball
CHI hands the ball to MOT
MOT holds the ball with her cupped hands
CHI looks at MOT . <aft> CHI scratches her nose and looks around the room
CHI looks at MOT then down at floor
MOT pushes the ball towards CHI
CHI pushes the ball away with her hand
<aft> MOT bounces the ball on the floor
CHI looks at the ball and turns around and sits on MOT's lap
<bef> MOT puts her arm around CHI . MOT looks at CHI
MOT holds the ball up to CHI
<bef> MOT rolls the ball on the floor
CHI watches the ball and nods then turns back towards the desk
MOT looks up at the desk
<$=1> CHI stands up and walks towards the desk
MOT starts to remove the cover of the box
<bef> MOT removes the cover of the box
MOT removes the cloth and sits on the floor
< .1-1> CHI watches MOT . <aft> CHI turns towards the desk
<bef> MOT puts the cloth on her head
CHI reaches for something on the desk
CHI walks over to MOT . CHI removes the cloth and throws it on the floor
CHI looks down at the cloth on the floor
<1> CHI puts her hand on the box and looks at it . <2> CHI looks down at the cloth
<1-3> CHI looks at the desk . <4-5 .> CHI looks at MOT
CHI squats down and points to the cloth
MOT picks up the cloth and puts it back in the box
MOT drops the cloth in the box
MOT holds the cover out to CHI
it is hard to understand CHI because she is drinking from her bottle
MOT moves the next box to the edge of the table
CHI drops her bottle on the floor
CHI puts her hand on the desk and pulls herself up to see the box
MOT starts to remove the cover of the box
MOT puts the box on the floor
CHI walks around the box uncertainly and then goes and sits on MOT's lap
<bef> MOT holds onto CHI and sits back on the floor . <aft> MOT lowers CHI onto the floor
CHI pushes away from the paper
MOT looks through the paper in the box with one hand and supports herself with the other
MOT puts a piece of paper on top of the others for CHI
CHI grabs MOT's arm lightly and sits back
MOT hands the crayon to CHI
CHI takes the crayon from MOT . <aft> CHI holds the crayon out to MOT
<2> MOT looks and points to the paper . <3-3 .> MOT looks at CHI
CHI holds the crayon out to MOT
MOT kisses CHI on the forehead
MOT takes the crayon and starts to draw
MOT writes CHI's name on the paper
MOT hands the crayon to CHI
CHI takes the crayon and starts to draw
<bef> CHI stops drawing . CHI continues to draw
<bef> CHI stops drawing and sits back
MOT looks down at the paper briefly
MOT watches CHI then looks up at the clock on the wall
CHI switches colors and begins writing again
CHI looks at the paper and smiles
MOT leans on the floor and begins digging through the box
CHI sits back and watches MOT
MOT lifts up some paper to reveal another crayon
MOT puts another crayon on top of the paper
CHI drops the crayon on the paper
MOT looks down at the crayon and then up at CHI
CHI takes a crayon that rolled to the edge of the box and puts it with the other crayons
CHI folds her hands on her lap and looks around the room
CHI leans back and looks at the box
CHI leans over the box and begins to color
CHI scratches her leg and looks up at the clock
CHI continues to pick up the crayons
CHI picks up all of the crayons and holds them
CHI sits back against MOT and looks at the crayons
<aft> CHI drops two of the crayons
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI picks up the crayons off of the floor
CHI turns towards the desk and holds the crayons up in the air
